director.name: 库德温·阿尤布 Kurdwin Ayub

introduction: In collaboration with protean director Kurdwin Ayub, Anthea takes the world they have so meticulously constructed one step further, venturing into the “hallowed halls” of a church, only to immediately break with all the traditions the place represents. There’s dancing, posing, twerking, and some canoodling with the sacred space’s mistress, while the song’s explosive beat is accentuated by burning meadows. Madonna would approve. (ce)
